posts.postText:
So, Pirate and I hopped on Skype and decided to get off our asses and work.

Firstly, the Wool Store is now open. You can buy any colour of wool you want, making it easier to make pretty buildings or pixel art.
Next, the Spleef Spectator's Area has been added, and its entrance is right next to the spleef lockers.
Finally, a Public Bedroom/Healing Area has been added, and will open shortly.

Soon to come are a place to buy slimeballs to make Sticky Pistons, new events, the end of the Spleef Tournament, and the event surrounding Herobrine's rented hotel room.
